comment: BOOM! We now have tomorrow morning's news cycle just days out of the election.... Leftist protesters interrupt a moment of silence for the Pittsburgh synagogue shooting victims, yell and scream at Marsha Blackburn and Lindsay Graham.

                              :mod (j / just))))
            :time (n2 / now))
      :snt3 (a2 / and
            :op1 (ii / interrupt-01
                  :ARG0 (p / person
                        :ARG0-of (p2 / protest-01)
                        :ARG1-of (l / left-19))
                  :ARG1 (m4 / moment

            :op2 (y / yell-01

            :op3 (s4 / scream-01

                        :op2 (p5 / person

                                    :op1 "Lindsay"
                                    :op2 "Graham"))))))
